nodes.text: The Kubilaï system contained the planet Ristal, which served as a base for the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The system was at five days of the Aldorus system and four of the Hoth system with a Class 2 hyperdrive.
The Kubilaï system was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario L'écume de l'espace which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 44.
